wikipedia_page.main: Rob Clarke is a Liverpool born and based acoustic music/rock music singer-songwriter. Described by AltSounds as 'more than just a man and a guitar' he is influenced by a range of genres including folk music, country music and psychedelic rock as well as formative experiences growing up in Liverpool, Nottingham, Huddersfield, Skipton and Aberdeen.

response: *Rob Clarke (born 1967), Canadian politician and Royal Canadian Mounted Police officer
